entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 3:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -15.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
